Home → News → Brave Words Flash Fiction Competition 2015 – the winners

Brave Words Flash Fiction Competition 2015 – the winners

Written by James Powell · Published Aug 5, 2015

We’re pleased to announce the winning stories from our Brave New Reads inspired Flash Fiction competition, ‘Brave Words’. Flash fiction is a style of fiction of extreme brevity. In this instance the story had to be told in 250 words or less.

The winners are as follows:

  • 1st Prize: Kate Steele’s story (PDF)
  • 2nd Prize: Steven Kirby’s story (PDF)
  • 3rd Prize: Elizabeth Cope’s story (PDF)
